data.Sentence: --- Lesson 89  A slip of the tongue

data.Sentence_cn: 人们总要想尽办法看不花钱的演出--哪怕是拙劣的演出。
data.Sentence: People will do anything to see a free show -- even if it is a bad one.

data.Sentence_cn: 当“皮尤”鸟食公司将在我们当地影院演出喜剧节目的消息传开后，
data.Sentence: When the news got round that a comedy show would be presented at our local cinema by the P. and U. Bird Seed Company,
we all rushed to see it.

data.Sentence_cn: 我们不得不排了好几个小时才进得场去。在演出开始前场内肯定已有好几百人了。
data.Sentence: We had to queue for hours to get in and there must have been several hundred people present just before the show began.

data.Sentence_cn: 不幸的是，这次演出是我们看过的最乏味的演出了。
data.Sentence: Unfortunately, the show was one of the dullest we have ever seen.

data.Sentence_cn: 那些没能进到场内的人没有必要感到失望，因为很多应该出场的专业演员都没有来。
data.Sentence: Those who failed to get in need not have felt disappointed, as many of the artistes who should have appeared did not come.

data.Sentence_cn: 那天晚上唯一有趣的事情是节目开始时那个报幕员的开场白。
data.Sentence: The only funny things we heard that evening came from the advertiser at the beginning of the programme.

data.Sentence_cn: 他显然非常紧张，局促不安地在麦克风前站了好几分钟。
data.Sentence: He was obviously very nervous and for some minutes stood awkwardly before the microphone.

data.Sentence_cn: 但他刚一开口说话，人们便哄堂大笑起来。
data.Sentence: As soon as he opened his mouth, everyone burst out laughing.

data.Sentence_cn: 我们都明白那个可怜的人应该说些什么，而他实际说的却是：
data.Sentence: We all know what the poor man should have said, but what he actually said was:

data.Sentence_cn: “这是‘浦伊’鸟食公司，好女士们，晚上和先生们！”
data.Sentence: 'This is the Poo and Ee Seed Bird Company. Good ladies, evening and gentlemen!'
